conversions.title: {{counter}}/{{total}} Conversions
conversions.tooltip: You have a maximum of {{total}} conversions with your current plan. Upgrade to Skimli Pro to get unlimited conversions

uploadFilesProvider.preventPageExit: If you leave the pages the upload files will be cancelled

maxSizeError.title: Error uploading file {{name}}
maxSizeError.description: Videos must be smaller than {{maxSize}} GB

minDurationError.title: Error uploading file {{name}}
minDurationError.description: Videos must be longer than {{duration}} minutes

uploadingError.title: Error uploading file {{name}}
uploadingError.description: An error occurred while uploading the file

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure you want to do that?
deleteDialog.description: Your video(s) will be removed from your library, and cannot be recovered after you click delete. Your conversions will not appear in any places where they are embedded, and anyone you previously shared the link with will not be able to access your content.
